Articles.Content:
I'm not sure if this is due to mod or if its a vanilla KSP issue but I've noticed that whenever i try to attach something to a spaceplane by a docking port (specifically the cargo holds in the B9 aerospace pack) I can't get the ports to link up like they do in the VAB. Its a real pain as what's the point of a cargo hold if you can't load it up with stuff to drop in orbit?

Has anyone else experienced/has a solution for this?

Sorry, just noticed the title should say SPH docking ports dont work.

Brain fart, my bad
In the VAB, docking ports are treated like decouplers. In flight, docking ports act like, y'know, docking ports.
No I mean that when i try and place two docking port against each other, intending to decouple them in orbit they wont connect properly in the SPH
